news_header: At least 40 troops killed in Central Africa military base attack.
news_text: On Sunday, armed forces attacked a military base in Central Africa, resulting in the deaths of at least 40 troops. President Mahamat Idriss Deby announced on Monday that a large operation has been initiated to locate the attackers, although he did not specify which terrorist group is suspected. The Islamic Boko Haram group is known to operate in the region.
